dt: {bc}to supply or impregnate (something, such as the soil or a liquid) with air
{bc}to supply (the blood) with oxygen by respiration

et: borrowed from New Latin {it}āerātus,{/it} past participle of {it}āerārī{/it} "to combine with carbonic acid," derivative of Latin {it}āer{/it} {et_link|air:1|air:1}
shortdef: to supply or impregnate (something, such as the soil or a liquid) with air
to supply (the blood) with oxygen by respiration
